messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

to export filter not working properly sent tuesday march export filter working properly hello have raised request weeks ago regarding field creation named export aiming help filter eligible contacts include our level surveys we asked for fields be re arranged order match survey gizmo fields when we conduct our import also another requirement mentioned we need ensure contacts field have mandatory data following fields segment type name main offer when asked test contacts appeared correct order seemed match required criteria since we launched our newest level surveys morning have exported necessary contacts export field we only had around contacts for selected accounts order double check have tested accuracy filter by going filter contacts manually filtered information order have data segment type name main offer then selected accounts we surveying period opposed export results filtering delivered over contacts matching our criteria seen attached contact exports difference quite striking if we double checked accuracy field we would have sent survey significantly shorted contact list hence please re open request investigate why happened why we have such big difference data filters please consider formal feedback log customer feedback ticket assign appropriate owner should you need further information please let know gladly assist best regards customer care
